file_content.text: I pity you, his blind obedient lap dog. No one's safe... with Baras. Not even you.
Comes with the territory.
I know.
I hope he dies a... painful... death.
Baras would never betray me.
I disagree.
Fool. What makes you so... special?
If he tries to betray me, he's in for a big surprise.
I'm ready for Baras.
So naive. You're nothing... nothing compared to him.
What does Baras think he's doing, sending you here after me?
Is he trying to make it look good, give himself an alibi? Because you can tell him "mission accomplished."
Almost all my men are dead. You've done a great job making this look legit. Now back off!
You're in league with Baras?
You're a spy, aren't you?
Aren't you smart? Yes, of course, idiot.
Not until you're dead.
So that's it, is it? After a decade of service, we're deemed expendable.
Baras is a fool. Our covers are intact. Why is he doing this?
You're not making sense.
We're on the same side, idiot.
These are my senior officers. We all defected over a decade ago and have been working for Baras since.
But wait, you didn't know this? He didn't tell you we were following his command?
I don't question my master's orders.
I didn't ask.
You should start.
This is foolish. We've been loyal to him; our covers are intact. Why would he destroy something so valuable?
It must have slipped his mind.
Maybe he forgot.
Things don't slip that man's mind. Every expression is a deliberate act.
Surely, you can see how foolish this is. Our covers are intact. We can make an incredible difference for him in the war. Why would he order our deaths?
He tells me everything.
[Lie] Of course I know.
Then why? Tell me, after so much loyal service, with our covers intact, why is he doing this?
All that matters is that I've been ordered to kill you.
It doesn't matter. [Attack]
Men, we've been betrayed. Fight for your lives!
This is the eventual fate of every spy, Admiral.
It was inevitable.
I suppose you're right about that. But he can't think that we're going to take this lying down.
Baras has a wicked sense of humor.
For fun.
Well, I hope he's laughing when you turn up dead.
Men, our master has decided we're expendable. Let's prove otherwise.
